thread.title: Colombia, ELN rebels to restart stalled peace talks - president

title: Colombia, ELN rebels to restart stalled peace talks - president
text: March 12, 2018 / 5:30 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago Colombia, ELN rebels to restart stalled peace talks - president Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BOGOTA (Reuters) - Colombia and the Marxist ELN guerrilla group will restart peace talks in Ecuador, President Juan Manuel Santos said on Monday, after a six-week pause marked by deaths on both sides. Colombia's President Juan Manuel Santos speaks during a news conference in Bogota, Colombia February 23, 2018. REUTERS/Jaime Saldarriaga Santos suspended talks in January after the National Liberation Army (ELN) launched a series of bomb attacks that killed eight police officers and injured dozens, immediately following the end of the two sidesâ€™ first-ever ceasefire. Reporting by Julia Symmes Cobb; Editing by Matthew Lewis
